name: Pebble timer
tagline: Timer for the Pebble Smart Watch
body:
### How to install
To install this timer simply open up the browser on the smartphone your Pebble is connected to and click here.

### How to Use
This timer will allow you to quickly setup a single timer. Upon opening the timer you can increment or decrement the timer by pressing and holding the up and down buttons. To start the timer just press the select button.

### Source Code
The source is available [here](https://github.com/mfollett/pebble_timer), have fun & please provide patches. This project is under active development, follow it or check back for new versions.

### Authors and Contributors
This was put together by @mfollet. Other contributors will be listed here and will be provided with the accompanying fame and fortune*.

### Support or Contact
Please [create an issue](https://github.com/mfollett/pebble_timer/issues/new) for any issues or feature requests. Alternatively, you can start a conversation on [Twitter](https://www.twitter.com/mfollett).

. * of which there is none.
